author: Mho_23
text:
selling ai videos to businesses is a gold mine in 2025...

but there's one problem everyone has: client acquisition

most people think you need a huge following or insane social media clout to get clients

but there are other ways that work just as well (if not better)

i put together a complete framework on one of the best methods for getting clients for your ai agency without any audience:
- get prospects on calls without cold pitching your services
- build trust before you ever ask for money
- position yourself as an authority (not just another agency spamming dms)

RT + reply with 'CLIENTS' and i'll send you the full guide (must follow so i can dm)
